text.div:
SW VerificationStatus Logical Model

Whether an assessment has been confirmed by testing or observation. CIMI Alignment: This attribute has been defined to align with FHIR. In AllergyIntolerance, the type is code.

name: VerificationStatusModel
title: SW VerificationStatus Logical Model
publisher: HL7 Patient Care and Clinical Information Modeling Initiative Work Groups
description:
Whether an assessment has been confirmed by testing or observation.
CIMI Alignment: This attribute has been defined to align with FHIR. In AllergyIntolerance, the type is code.
